translation.en: Not at the table, son.
Come on.
Grace first.
You know better.
Father, we are gathered here to share this food in your name.
translation.zh:
‎上帝啊 我们聚在这里
‎以你之名分享这食物

translation.en: Bless this food into our bodies, O Lord.
translation.zh: ‎祝福这食物进入我们的身体 主啊

translation.en: Bless our hearts and all that we do, O Lord,
translation.zh: ‎祝福我们的心以及我们的所作所为 ‎主啊 好叫我们奉你之名而行…

translation.en: so that we may walk in your name--
translation.zh: ‎主啊 好叫我们奉你之名而行…

translation.en: Who will that be at this time?
I have no idea.
No.
Leave my family alone.
Theodore.
It's okay.
It's okay.
Leave them out of this.
Your quarrel is with me.
Let's go outside, take a walk,
and handle our business.
-[man] Please. -[shakily] No.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.
[softly] Please, I'm begging you.
-No! -[body thuds]
[boy screaming] No! No! No! No!
[boy crying] No! No! No!
No! No! Please!
No!
No! No, no, no, no, no! No!
[in Spanish] Father Esparza?
I'm here for confession…
and the collection.
You know what happens when you're late with my coins.
translation.zh: ‎你知道给钱给晚了是什么下场

translation.en: [man in English] What possesses a man
to paint a scorpion on his hand?
Excuse me?
A snake, I understand that.
The Garden of Eden, the Bible, etcetera.
But a scorpion?
Well, that puzzles me.
Who are you?
Just a man.
Here to kill the Scorpion.
Jesus Cortez.
[Cortez] Those were, uh, different times.
Whatever happened between you and I must have been a long, long time ago.
translation.zh:
‎无论我们之间发生了什么
‎那一定是很久以前的事了

translation.en: No.
No.
Please.
Please.
I…
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
[priest] Is it over?
This is a wanted man.
Turn his body in, you'll get $5,000 for your church.
translation.zh:
‎把他的尸体交给警察
‎你就能为你的教会筹得五千美元

translation.en: [spluttering] Why aren't you taking him in yourself?
I'm worth ten.
♪ I make all the guns go bang ♪ ♪ Dot Seventeen with the switch It’ll change you ♪
♪ Sins of the father darken the doorstep I became you ♪ ♪ Faithful till the end ♪
[man singing] ♪ Upon my return ♪
♪ See a changed soul ♪
-[gun cocks] -♪ That road was far ♪
♪ And way too long ♪
♪ They'll run from me ♪
♪ As they ran from you ♪
♪ That fear in me ♪
♪ Is in a distant… ♪
[whispers] ♪ View ♪
[man 2] It's the Nat Love Gang!
Stop firing! Stop firing!
It's one man! We got him pinned!
Wait for his head to show, then blow the naps off that motherfucker.
translation.zh:
‎等他的头露出来
‎我们就把那混蛋的脑袋射穿

translation.en: Be patient. [man 3] I hear patience is a virtue.
translation.zh:
‎-耐心点
‎-我听说耐心是一种美德

translation.en: But I ain't never been able to wait to see if the motherfucker true.
translation.zh:
‎但我从来都等不到
‎验证这句话的正确性

translation.en: -Jim Beckwourth. -Brothers Grime.
It's Grimes with an "S," you egotistical piece of shit.
translation.zh:
‎是乌垢斯 后面有个“斯”
‎你这个自大狂

translation.en: I remember a time y'all hoods used to be crimson.
translation.zh: ‎我记得你们以前的面罩都是深红色的

translation.en: Known as the Crimson Hood Gang.
Them motherfuckers pink now.
You know, Mama used to say, "Jim is such a sweet boy." You know what I said?
translation.zh:
‎妈妈过去说：“吉姆真是个
‎贴心的男孩” 你知道我说什么了？

translation.en: "Mama, fuck Jim! Look what he did to my fucking eye!"
translation.zh:
‎“妈妈 该死的吉姆！
‎看他对我眼睛做了什么？”

translation.en: -I am sweet. -You're not sweet.
-I'm sweet. -You're not sweet. -I'm sweet. -[man 4] You're not.
-[Jim] Bitch, I'm sweet. -[man 4] You know what?
translation.zh:
‎-混蛋 我很贴心 怎么了？
‎-你知道怎么着？

translation.en: I'd rather be dead than hear this motherfucker keep talking.
translation.zh: ‎我宁肯死也不愿意听这混蛋继续说话

translation.en: Much obliged, motherfuckers.
What the hell is that shit, playing quick-draw games when my ass is getting shot at?
translation.zh:
‎这什么情况 在我被枪击的时候
‎玩快速拔枪？

translation.en: Hey, hey. You got your lucky coin, don't you?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你有幸运硬币 对吧？

translation.en: Grow up, Jim. This is real grown-men shit. We can die.
translation.zh:
‎成熟点 吉姆 这是真正的成人游戏
‎我们可能会死的

translation.en: But we not gonna die.
'Cause I'm lightnin' with the blam-blams. Admit it.
translation.zh: ‎因为我开枪速度非常快 承认吧

translation.en: You know, you might could be, but I hearsay there's a quick draw
translation.zh: ‎你可能是很快 但我听说有人

translation.en: more lightnin' than you, go by the name of Cherokee Bill.
translation.zh: ‎速度比你更快 他名叫切诺基·比尔

translation.en: [mockingly] "Cherokee Bill."
You hearsay. You don't see-say.
translation.zh: ‎你是道听途说 不是亲眼所见

translation.en: So I say fuck Cherokee Bill.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才看不起切诺基·比尔呢

translation.en: You know, rather than complaining, you should be applauding my performance.
translation.zh: ‎你不该抱怨 而应为我的表现鼓掌

translation.en: The only words that should be coming out your Black-ass lips…
translation.zh: ‎你这黑色的嘴唇唯一该说的话…

translation.en: -"Black-ass lips"? -…should be…
-[softly] …gracias. -That was smooth.
-I know. -Black lips are beautiful lips.
-Would you stop reaching, negro? -[Jim] God damn.
You just killed my brother.
Your half-brother, calm down. Look like your day going a little bad.
translation.zh: ‎你的异父兄弟 冷静 ‎看来你今天不太顺啊

translation.en: Better than you sons of bitches
when you find out whose money you done fucked with.
Correction. Who you done fucked with.
translation.zh: ‎更正一下 应该说是你们招惹了那人

translation.en: Y'all rob banks. We rob y'all.
translation.zh: ‎你们抢劫了银行 我们抢你们的

translation.en: And ain't a negro from here to Africa gonna know we even exist.
translation.zh:
‎从这里到非洲的
‎黑人同胞都不知道我们的存在

translation.en: You think I'm talking about a bank?
♪ Where they go-oh-oh-oh-oh ♪
♪ Oh, inna the days of old ♪ ♪ Inna the days of old ♪
Evening, gent. Kindly check your weapon and enjoy the festivities.
translation.zh:
‎晚上好 先生 请把武器寄存起来
‎享受这个盛会

translation.en: This is Stagecoach Mary's place and ain't no guns allowed?
translation.zh:
‎这里是“驿站邮递员”玛丽的地盘
‎不允许带枪吗？

translation.en: 'Cept for Mary's, naturally.
Naturally.
Naturally, she put a fresh-faced pup like yourself here to see to it.
translation.zh: ‎她当然让年轻小伙在这里处理这些事

translation.en: Oh, I got to see to a lot of things, Mr. Love.
translation.zh: ‎我负责很多事情 洛夫先生

translation.en: People see me and they don't feel too intimidated by what they see. See?
translation.zh:
‎人们看到我 他们不会
‎被眼前所见吓到 懂吗？

translation.en: We familiar?
No, but you right famous around these parts.
translation.zh: ‎不熟 但你在这附近很出名

translation.en: Folks say you once cut down three men with one bullet.
translation.zh:
‎人们说你曾经用一枚子弹
‎了结了三个人的性命

translation.en: Now, I ain't met a man who can do that yet. Excuse me.
translation.zh: ‎我现在还没见过能做到的人 失陪

translation.en: Evening, gents. Kindly check your weapons and enjoy your evening.
translation.zh:
‎晚上好 先生们 请把武器寄存起来
‎好好享受你们的夜晚

translation.en: I'd sooner check my right arm, boy.
translation.zh: ‎那还不如砍下我的右手臂 孩子

translation.en: Then you can head on over to Jourdon Anderson's.
translation.zh: ‎那你就可以去乔丹·安德森那里

translation.en: You can hold your weapon and drink over there.
translation.zh: ‎你可以拿着武器 在那边喝酒

translation.en: We drinking here, you puny little fuck.
translation.zh: ‎我们在这里喝 你这个弱鸡

translation.en: -[grunts] -[man] Hey!
Some folk tend to feel a way, regardless.
translation.zh: ‎有些人顽固不化 不遵守规则

translation.en: Get 'em over to Doc Brown's. -Take they guns to the sheriff. -[man groans]
translation.zh:
‎把他们送到布朗医生那里去
‎把他们的枪交给警长

translation.en: They can get 'em back when they leave town.
translation.zh: ‎他们离开城镇的时候可以拿回来

translation.en: What they call you?
They call me Cuffee.
[man 1] This why I'm here!
-♪ One! ♪ -♪ Get that horse and his wagon ♪
-♪ Two! ♪ -♪ Get that man and his rifle ♪
-♪ Three! ♪ -♪ Get that priest and his Bible ♪
-♪ Four! ♪ -♪ For them that's dead on arrival ♪
-♪ Five! ♪ -♪ Them that pray see heaven ♪
-♪ Six! ♪ -♪ Them that don't see the devil ♪

-♪ Nine! ♪ -♪ So break them chains and shackles ♪
translation.zh:
‎-九！
‎-所以打破他们的枷锁和束缚

translation.en: ♪ Ten! ♪
Come again.
-♪ One! ♪ -♪ Get that horse and its wagon ♪
-♪ Two! ♪ -♪ Get that man and his rifle ♪
-♪ Three! ♪ -♪ Get that priest and his Bible ♪
-♪ Four! ♪ -♪ For them that's dead on arrival ♪
-♪ Five! ♪ -♪ Them that pray see heaven ♪
-♪ Six! ♪ -♪ Them that don't see the devil ♪
-♪ Seven! ♪ -♪ Separate but equal ♪
-♪ Eight! ♪ -♪ Say them that slaved my people ♪
-♪ Nine! ♪ -♪ So break them chains and shackles ♪
translation.zh:
‎-九！
‎-所以打破他们的枷锁和束缚

translation.en: ♪ Ten! ♪
Not again.
You still ain't talking to me?
[softly] Get out.
What?
I said leave.
What was that kiss for, then?
To remind you of what it was.
translation.zh: ‎那是提醒你我们曾是什么关系

translation.en: That's to remind you of what it is.
translation.zh: ‎那是提醒你我们现在是什么关系

translation.en: Excuse me.
Cuff, clean this man up.
-Oh, yes, ma'am. -[Mary] Thank you.
Second floor. Third room on the left.
[man] Mary.
The only thing I need to hear coming out your mouth is "Goodbye, Mary."
translation.zh: ‎我只需要听你说：“再见 玛丽”

translation.en: [man] The one thing you'll never hear me say again.
translation.zh: ‎你再也不会听到我说这话了

translation.en: Till the next time you hear tell
of the whereabouts of some man that done you dirt.
translation.zh:
‎有人背叛你或仇人的下落
‎你就会说了

translation.en: Ain't none of them left.
So you found the Scorpion?
Mary, the only thing that mean anything to me in this world now
translation.zh:
‎玛丽 现在世界上
‎对我来说唯一有意义的

translation.en: is you.
And what about the Nat Love Gang?
Ain't been much of a gang since you left.
translation.zh: ‎自从你走了以后 就不像帮派了

translation.en: Just me, Jim, Bill.
Next time they come around, I'll sort it.
translation.zh: ‎下次他们来的时候 我会解决的

translation.en: You know, I can almost believe that.
Almost, 'cause you didn't get the last one, did you?
translation.zh:
‎差点 因为你没有
‎解决最后一个人 对吧？

translation.en: You can say his name, Mary.
translation.zh: ‎你可以说他的名字 玛丽

translation.en: What about Rufus Buck?
Rufus in Yuma for the rest of his natural life.
translation.zh: ‎鲁弗斯余生都会在尤马监狱度过

translation.en: For a man like him, that's worse than death.
translation.zh: ‎像他这样的男人 这样比死亡更糟

translation.en: As long as that man draw breath,
your spirit is gonna be cursed and wild as it ever was.
translation.zh:
‎你的灵魂会像以前一样
‎受到诅咒而且无处安放

translation.en: I made things,
I built things, and I ain't gonna risk all that
just because you decide to come trottin' back.
translation.zh: ‎因为你决定跑回来而冒险放弃一切

translation.en: -"Trottin'"? -Yeah.
-[scoffs] Okay, well. -[Mary] Mmm-hmm.
I guess I came to the wrong saloon
'cause I ain't talking to the Mary Fields I thought I knew.
translation.zh:
‎因为现在与我说话的玛丽·菲尔德
‎与我以为我认识的那位不同

translation.en: -Yep. Things have changed. -I see that.
translation.zh:
‎-对 情况已经变了
‎-我发现了

translation.en: 'Cause that Mary…
That Mary…
…don't shy away from nothin'.
What was it the Apache called you? [man] Wolf Lady?
translation.zh: ‎阿帕切族人叫你什么？狼夫人？

translation.en: No. That's some bullshit Pickett used to say.
translation.zh: ‎不是 那是皮克特以前胡编乱造的

translation.en: That's bullshit Pickett used to say.
translation.zh: ‎那是皮克特以前胡编乱造的

translation.en: -Apache called me Coyote Woman. -Hmm.
Yeah, Wolf Lady more like it.
[man] My hat.
There.
[man 2] I'm coming in.
Now, Wolf Lady, don't blow the head off my neck.
translation.zh: ‎狼夫人 别把我的头打飞

translation.en: -Nat. -[Nat] Pickett.
You got the worst timing in the history of timing.
translation.zh: ‎你来的可真不是时候 史上最糟

translation.en: Oh, y'all was makin' sex?
I apologize. But what I got to show you can't wait.
translation.zh:
‎我要道歉 但我要给你们看的
‎是你迫不及待想知道的事

translation.en: Well, well, well.
If it ain't the debonair dipshit himself.
translation.zh: ‎这不是那个温文尔雅的笨蛋本尊嘛

translation.en: Whoa, easy, Nat. Listen to what the man got to say first.
translation.zh: ‎放轻松 先听这个人要说什么

translation.en: So he can tell me the same stories he been tellin' you?
Why the fuck would I lie?
Rufus Buck is behind bars for the rest of his life.
translation.zh:
‎鲁弗斯·巴克
‎余生都要在监狱里度过了

translation.en: -[man] He gettin' out. -[cocks gun] How?
Damned if I know. I just know it's so.
translation.zh: ‎我怎么知道 我只知道他要出来了

translation.en: All the gangs are gettin' set to ride for him again.
translation.zh: ‎所有帮派都准备好为他而战了

translation.en: Half that take was his. [chuckling]
translation.zh: ‎你们偷的一半的钱都是他的

translation.en: And you fools took his money.
You think Rufus Buck was gonna let you keep half that money,
translation.zh:
‎你觉得鲁弗斯·巴克
‎会让你们留着那一半的钱？

translation.en: and you callin' me a fool?
I guess I am. [chuckles]
On your feet.
Exhale.
Now get out of here.
Leave.
What you doin'? We coulda killed the last of the Crimson Hoods.
translation.zh:
‎你在干什么？我们本可以杀掉
‎最后一个深红面罩的人

translation.en: It's called the Crimson Hood Gang. You think that's the last one?
translation.zh:
‎他们叫深红面罩帮
‎你觉得这是最后一个人？

translation.en: Yeah.
I woulda bet my left six-shooter he was about to kill that boy.
translation.zh:
‎我敢用我左边的六发式左轮手枪打赌
‎他本来会杀了那个男孩

translation.en: If that man telling the truth, Nat just did him a whole lot worse.
translation.zh:
‎如果那个人说的是实话
‎纳特对他做的事可比杀了他糟多了

translation.en: [driver] What the hell are you doin' out here?
That ain't no way to board a train, you damn stupid ni--
translation.zh: ‎这可不是上火车的方法 你这个傻…

translation.en: You know, he might coulda said nincompoop.
We ain't no nincompoop.
If they say something that even start with "N,"
they gonna meet the same fate.
Let 'em see your faces.
All right, stay calm, everybody. Don't… Hey, don't touch nothin'.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 冷静 各位 别碰任何东西

translation.en: My name is Cherokee Bill.
Now let it be known that I don't particularly enjoy violence.
translation.zh: ‎我要声明 我并不太喜欢暴力

translation.en: That being said, you are currently in the company of extremely violent individuals.
translation.zh:
‎话虽如此 你们现在
‎跟一群极端暴力的人在一起

translation.en: Try some of that.
-Ugh. Shit. -[women gasp]
So, don't do no stupid shit. All right?
Get off this train now, you motherless scum.
translation.zh: ‎现在从火车上下去 你这没妈的混蛋

translation.en: You must be the hero.
Great Spirit, why is there always one?
translation.zh: ‎我的神啊 怎么总有一个逞英雄的？

translation.en: You're rude.
I might actually enjoy inflicting violence on you.
translation.zh: ‎我可能会很享受对你施加暴力的

translation.en: But who knows?
Maybe you'll win.
Let's see.
See my point?
Now, step aside so that we may conclude our business here without further ado.
translation.zh: ‎现在 请让开 好让我们速战速决

translation.en: Stop right there.
No.
[nervously] I said stop.
Put the weapon down, boy.
Or we kill everybody on this train.
translation.zh: ‎否则我们就杀了火车上所有人

translation.en: -I said put the gun down. -[passengers gasping]
It's okay.
Are there any more soldiers on that car?
There are.
Exactly how many?
Thirty.
[gasps] Ten!
See, that's all you had to say.
translation.zh: ‎看吧 你说这么多就行了

translation.en: Open the door.
I said open the damn door.
Here we are.
My dear battalion.
I imagine you have all your artillery aimed at the door.
translation.zh: ‎我猜你们把所有火力都对准了门吧

translation.en: I'd like to inform you that in front of that door
translation.zh: ‎我想告诉你们 在那扇门前

translation.en: lies one of your very own troops.
Any bullets coming through that door will hit him first, okay?
translation.zh:
‎任何穿过那扇门进来的子弹
‎都会先打中他 好吗？

translation.en: State your name, criminal.
Oh, I'm not a criminal, sir, um, but my name is Cherokee Bill.
translation.zh:
‎我不是罪犯 长官
‎不过我叫切诺基·比尔

translation.en: What's your name?
My name is Officiant of the Goddamn Law.
You let that soldier go immediately.
Leave this train now and no one will be hurt.
translation.zh: ‎现在离开火车 没人会受伤的

translation.en: Oh, that sounds like fear talking, Mr. Officiant of the Goddamn Law.
translation.zh:
‎这听起来像是害怕时说的话
‎该死的法律执行官先生

translation.en: And we done already hurt a couple people.
You're just going to let us get away Dred Scott free?
State your purpose, bastard.
Also, I'm not a bastard.
But you've got something we want. We've got a soldier that you want.
translation.zh:
‎但你有我们想要的东西
‎我们有个你想要的士兵

translation.en: Now, I suggest we make a peaceful trade and everybody lives to see another day.
translation.zh:
‎我现在建议我们和平交易
‎大家都能活得好好的

translation.en: -Sound dandy? -Just let the boy go.
translation.zh:
‎-听起来很棒吧？
‎-放过那孩子吧

translation.en: -[screams] -Jake!
I'm okay, Pa!
That's just a flesh wound, sir.
You got ten seconds to put your guns down and open up this damn door,
translation.zh: ‎你有10秒钟放下枪 打开门

translation.en: or your little kin here shall perish.
Harm him further and I will kill every last one of you godless sons of bitches.
translation.zh:
‎你们要是再伤害他
‎我会把你们全杀了

translation.en: Goddamn, Trudy. You know I like my countdowns.
translation.zh: ‎该死 楚蒂 你知道我喜欢倒数

translation.en: My apologies, sir. My friend here doesn't like arithmetic.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 先生 我这位朋友不喜欢算数

translation.en: Be that as it may, seven seconds.
Six.
-Lay down your rifles. -Five.
I said lay them down. Four.
Three.
Well, all right. Thank you kindly. Go ahead and walk, boy.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 谢谢 孩子 向前走吧

translation.en: Keep walkin'. Just keep moving. No one do anything stupid.
translation.zh:
‎继续走 继续移动
‎任何人都别做傻事

translation.en: Just walk like you been taught.
[mimicking drill sergeant] Left, right, left. Left, right, left. Left, right, left.
♪ Skip to the Lou, my darlin' ♪
-Open it. -I can't.
[officer] The key is back in Yuma. And the next--
translation.zh: ‎钥匙在尤马那里 下一站…

translation.en: One more time.
You will be hounded to the ends of the earth for this.
I don't like long distances, Lieutenant General Abbott.
translation.zh: ‎我不喜欢长途跋涉 阿伯特中将

translation.en: Ever cross your mind why you was given the task
translation.zh: ‎你有没有想过 为什么要派你

translation.en: of transporting a lone outlaw from one prison to another?
translation.zh:
‎把一个犯人从一个监狱
‎转到另一个监狱呢？

translation.en: Full pardon for Mr. Buck and all his associates for all misdeeds.
translation.zh:
‎巴克先生和他的同伙所犯下的罪行
‎全部被赦免了

translation.en: Signed General George Pryce.
What's this about?
Well, he came to us with a proposition.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 他给了我们一个提议

translation.en: Kill a particular Officiant of the Goddamn Law.
translation.zh: ‎杀掉某个该死的法律执行官

translation.en: A man so crooked that even the government is embarrassed by his misdeeds.
translation.zh:
‎这个人很腐败
‎连政府都为其恶行感到羞愧

translation.en: Apparently, you and your men wiped out an entire town,
translation.zh: ‎显然 你和你的人摧毁了整个城镇

translation.en: women and children included,
to steal silver.
-Now, that's some unscrupulous shit. -Unscrupulous shit.
translation.zh:
‎-那是无耻的行径
‎-无耻的行径

translation.en: Please. I'll dis--
[Jake] No!
Pa! No, no, no, no, no.
[crying] Pa.
Who here can drive a train?
I said--
Everybody but him.
Evening, sir. Check your weapon with me and enjoy what's left of the night.
translation.zh:
‎晚上好 先生 请把武器给我
‎好好享受剩下的夜晚吧

translation.en: Oh, no need to show me that star. I know who you is.
translation.zh:
‎无需给我展示那颗星星
‎我知道你是谁

translation.en: In here, though, I be the sheriff, and that make Ms. Mary the marshal.
translation.zh:
‎但在这儿 我是警长
‎而玛丽小姐就是执法官

translation.en: And the marshal say, "Don't nobody come in here gunned up,
translation.zh:
‎执法官说
‎“任何人都不能带枪来这儿

translation.en: or they might could get gunned down."
My badge begs to differ.
Check your gun-belt.
Excuse me.
So how you plan on taking me in, Marshal?
translation.zh: ‎你打算怎么逮捕我 执法官？

translation.en: Staring me to death? How about just death?
Just a pipe.
You mind?
Never known you to touch it.
Only after I kill a man.
Or before.
I was on the trail of the Crimson Hood Gang
on account of a bank robbery in Kansas City.
translation.zh: ‎因为他们在堪萨斯城抢了一家银行

translation.en: Turned out somebody got to 'em before me.
You know I don't rob banks, Marshal.
translation.zh: ‎你知道我不抢银行的 执法官

translation.en: But you rob them that do, which is all the same to me.
translation.zh:
‎但你们会抢去抢了银行的人
‎这对我来说是一回事

translation.en: -Texas. -What?
I was in Texas at the time of that robbery.
translation.zh:
‎那起抢劫案发生的时候
‎我在德克萨斯

translation.en: How you know when it took place?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么知道它什么时候发生的？

translation.en: Whenever any bank robbery took place, I was in Texas.
translation.zh:
‎无论何时发生银行抢劫案
‎我都在德克萨斯

translation.en: Unless, of course, the robbery took place in Texas.
translation.zh: ‎当然除非是发生在德克萨斯

translation.en: Way I hear it, some of them boys with the Crimson Hoods
translation.zh: ‎据我所知 有些深红面罩帮的人

translation.en: are part of a new Rufus Buck Gang, Nat.
translation.zh: ‎成了新鲁弗斯巴克帮的人 纳特

translation.en: Rufus in Yuma.
He out. But you knew that already, didn't you?
translation.zh: ‎他出来了 但你已经知道了 对吧？

translation.en: Why you sitting here monologuing, drinking up my whiskey,
translation.zh:
‎你为什么坐在这里自说自话
‎喝我的威士忌？

translation.en: when you should be out rounding up your little deputies?
translation.zh: ‎你该出去召集你的小警官啊

translation.en: 'Cause he been pardoned, Nat.
translation.zh: ‎因为他已经被赦免了 纳特

translation.en: Rufus Buck been absolved of his countless depredations.
translation.zh:
‎鲁弗斯·巴克无数次的劫掠
‎都被赦免了

translation.en: Seeing as I've been scouring the terrain looking for bank robbers and such,
translation.zh:
‎鉴于我一直
‎在这一带找银行抢劫犯之类的

translation.en: that particular piece of news failed to reach me.
What they sayin'?
Something about guns, killin'.
Why you let that kid take my gun? What kinda stupid rule is that?
translation.zh:
‎你为什么让那孩子拿走我的枪？
‎这是什么愚蠢的规定？

translation.en: -Should be four guns pointing at-- -Shut up, Pickett.
translation.zh:
‎-应该四把枪对着…
‎-闭嘴 皮克特

translation.en: You shoot, he dead.
You miss, all y'all die.
translation.zh: ‎你失误了 你们就都死了

translation.en: You, come here.
Take these cuffs. Cuff this man.
translation.zh: ‎把这手铐拿去 把这个人铐起来

translation.en: Or I put three in his chest right now, lessen the trouble.
translation.zh: ‎否则我就朝他胸口开三枪 减少麻烦

translation.en: Go on.
Tell this young buck to back up.
Easy, Jim.
Everybody in here know who I am.
I'm taking Nat Love to Fort Smith to be tried.
translation.zh: ‎我要带纳特·洛夫去史密斯堡受审

translation.en: Anybody try to follow me, y'all know what I do.
translation.zh:
‎要是有任何人想跟踪我
‎你们都知道结局的

translation.en: Come on.
Y'all enjoy the rest of the evening.
translation.zh: ‎你们尽情享受剩余的夜晚吧

translation.en: ♪ Going to the promise land ♪
Cherokee Bill, Ms. Smith, top of the morning to you both.
translation.zh: ‎切诺基·比尔 史密斯小姐 早上好呀

translation.en: Mr. Buck, glad to have you back in Redwood, sir.
translation.zh:
‎巴克先生
‎真高兴你回红木城了 先生

translation.en: Any word on the take from the Kansas City bank?
translation.zh: ‎堪萨斯城银行那边有任何消息吗？

translation.en: The Crimson Hoods took it for $25,000.
But they were ambushed before they got here.
Everybody knows it's suicide to take from us.
translation.zh: ‎大家都知道抢我们的钱等于自杀

translation.en: Someone obviously disagrees.
Goddamn it. That just put us right back where we started.
translation.zh: ‎该死 那会让我们回到起点

translation.en: How we supposed to build a Mecca without any bricks?
translation.zh: ‎没有砖头 我们怎么建基地？

translation.en: [Trudy] We gonna have to take it out of our own bank.
translation.zh: ‎我们得从自己的银行里取出来

translation.en: [man] We don't have that type of money, Trudy.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有那么多钱 楚蒂

translation.en: We only got a few pennies over $2,500.
What did he say?
-[man] 2,500-- -I heard you.
-[Trudy] Wiley. -[Cherokee Bill] Yeah.
[Rufus] Sure is hot, ain't it?
What's up, little man?
-You wanna see something? -[boy] Yeah.
Watch this now. Don't take your eyes off it.
translation.zh: ‎现在看这个 别移开目光

translation.en: Oh, it's still there! [laughs]
Rufus Buck.
Look at you.
Relic of yesteryear with nothin'.
And you think you can roll into my town and take what belong to me?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得你能闯进我的地盘
‎拿走我的东西吗？

translation.en: Who the fuck you think I am, huh?
Ain't nobody scared of you and ain't nobody runnin'.
I'm a sinister motherfucker too.
One click of my finger and you disappear.
translation.zh: ‎我只要手指一按 你就没命了

translation.en: So I suggest you leave…
before I finish my steak.
-And if you even think about sticking-- -[knocking on door]
Come in.
What is it, Carson?
Sheriff, Mr. Buck wants to see you out front.
translation.zh: ‎警长 巴克先生想在前面见你

translation.en: Tell that man I ain't got nothing to say to him.
translation.zh: ‎告诉那个人 我跟他无话可说

translation.en: It wasn't a request.
Wiley Escoe.
Rufus.
[Rufus] You wanna sell this town while I rot in prison?
translation.zh: ‎你想趁我蹲监狱的时候卖掉小镇？

translation.en: The world you knew is gone.
translation.zh: ‎你了解的那个世界已经消失了

translation.en: There's a flood comin'.
Do you think you can hold onto this place when it hit?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得洪水来袭时
‎你能在这地方待多久？

translation.en: At least I know enough to get mine and get out.
translation.zh:
‎至少我完全知道
‎要拿回属于我的东西 然后离开

translation.en: Kill me…
and you'll have nothing.
You know, a man like you will have us all subservient
translation.zh: ‎像你这样的人会让我们都屈服

translation.en: till the end of our days
so's long as you can buy yourself a house,
a badge, and them goddamn gold teeth.
translation.zh: ‎一枚徽章 还有该死的金牙

translation.en: You want to do this here?
[Wiley] There you go. That's what you want, right?
translation.zh: ‎好了 那就是你想要的 对吧？

translation.en: That's what you came here for?
I won't disappoint you. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎我不会让你失望的 来吧

translation.en: That's what you want. Want some more?
translation.zh: ‎那就是你想要的 还想要更多吗？

translation.en: You want some more, right? You want some more?
translation.zh:
‎那就是你想要的 对吧？
‎还想要更多吗？

translation.en: [Rufus] Come here, motherfucker.
Here you go.
Oh shit. I done hit gold.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我把金牙打出来了

translation.en: Hey, boy. Come here. Come, get that gold. Get that gold.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 孩子 来这里 来 把金子拿走

translation.en: All right. Tell your mama you rich now! Go ahead!
translation.zh: ‎好吧 告诉你妈妈你有钱了！去吧！

translation.en: [Rufus] Now, I ain't gonna kill you, Wiley.
translation.zh: ‎我不会现在杀了你 威利

translation.en: [echoing] You and I were friends once.
But know this. Redwood will never be yours, never.
translation.zh: ‎但你要知道 红木城永远不会属于你

translation.en: Never.
Matter of fact, you ain't welcome here no more.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 这里不再欢迎你

translation.en: Now…
I want you to vacate immediately or die where you lay.
translation.zh: ‎马上滚蛋 否则就死在这里

translation.en: Say what?
That's right.
You coulda taken these off a while back. Yep.
Tell me something. How you know Rufus will be in Redwood?
translation.zh:
‎跟我说说
‎你怎么知道鲁弗斯会去红木城？

translation.en: [Nat] He's taking that money from them Crimson Hoods.
translation.zh: ‎他想要深红面罩帮从他那里偷的钱

translation.en: That's where he'll be.
Now you teaming up with a marshal to bring him in.
translation.zh: ‎你现在和执法官联手逮捕他

translation.en: I ain't bringing him in. I'm bringing him down.
translation.zh: ‎我不会逮捕他 我要让他死

translation.en: And we ain't teaming up, old man.
translation.zh: ‎而且我们不是一伙的 老家伙

translation.en: Your life's expendable, Marshal. My gang's ain't.
translation.zh:
‎你死了无关紧要 执法官
‎我兄弟的命很值钱

translation.en: Shit, since we're out here, I oughta tell you…
translation.zh:
‎该死 既然我们在这里
‎我应该告诉你

translation.en: I was fixin' to kill you…
when you and your fellas brought in Rufus.
translation.zh: ‎在你和你的同伙逮捕鲁弗斯的时候

translation.en: A lot of men be fixin', son.
translation.zh: ‎很多人都打算杀了我 孩子

translation.en: They always seem to die before they get the job done.
translation.zh: ‎他们总是在完成任务前就先死了

translation.en: Just for the record…
I took Rufus in alone.
translation.zh: ‎我之前单枪匹马就逮捕了鲁弗斯

translation.en: [Nat] Mary.
I figured you'd be halfway to Fort Smith by now.
translation.zh:
‎我以为你现在已经
‎在去史密斯堡的路上了

translation.en: You can put that gun down, Marshal. This ain't a ambush.
translation.zh: ‎你可以把枪放下 执法官 这不是埋伏

translation.en: You, on the other hand, might wanna keep yours handy.
translation.zh: ‎而另一方面 你最好随身携带枪支

translation.en: Do you think I'm stupid enough to fall for that bullshit y'all pulled in my saloon?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得我会傻到
‎相信你在酒馆里说的那些话吗？

translation.en: I don't want you mixed up in this no more.
Then you shoulda told me so.
I must confess to some raw feelings myself.
This ain't no road to ask a friend to travel.
translation.zh: ‎这条路太过危险 我不想让朋友加入

translation.en: Now you take that money we took off them Crimson Hoods
translation.zh:
‎现在你拿着我们
‎从深红面罩帮那里抢的钱

translation.en: and you buy that ranch you always blabbing about. Hmm?
translation.zh: ‎去买一个你一直念叨的牧场

translation.en: That's mighty generous of you, but that ain't how this gang work.
translation.zh:
‎你真慷慨大方
‎但这帮人可不会这么处事

translation.en: Take stays in the usual place, ready to be shared three ways when we come back.
translation.zh: ‎和往常一样 我们回来时平分成三份

translation.en: Ain't no coming back from this.
Now get out of here.
All of you. This ain't your fight.
translation.zh: ‎全都走 这不是你们的战斗

translation.en: You take on the Devil himself, you gonna need more than you and the marshal.
translation.zh:
‎你要挑战恶魔本尊
‎光是你和执法官不够

translation.en: I seen the Devil, and Rufus Buck ain't him.
translation.zh: ‎我见过恶魔 鲁弗斯·巴克可不是

translation.en: Devil's white.
You got a reason you wanna die, Jim?
translation.zh: ‎有什么原因让你不想活了吗 吉姆？

translation.en: Outside of you saving me from this?
translation.zh: ‎你之前救了我以外的原因吗？

translation.en: Besides, Monroe said Cherokee Bill run with Rufus.
translation.zh:
‎而且 梦露说切诺基·比尔
‎跟鲁弗斯跑了

translation.en: Every time I speak on my speed,
translation.zh: ‎我每次说到我的速度的时候

translation.en: a motherfucker wanna pull Cherokee Bill out they ass.
translation.zh: ‎总有混蛋提到切诺基·比尔的名字

translation.en: I'ma put a end to that argument once and for all.
Like they say in the Book of Clarence, "No man out-speed me."
translation.zh:
‎就像他们在《克劳伦斯之书》中说的
‎“没人速度大过我”

translation.en: Out-speed ain't a word, and Clarence ain't no book.
translation.zh: ‎这话可不太通顺 而且这也不是本书

translation.en: I'm hopin' Cherokee put a bullet in your ass just to shut you up.
translation.zh: ‎我希望切诺基朝你开一枪 让你闭嘴

translation.en: -Hey. -You left these on my wall, Mr. Love.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿
‎-你把它落在我的墙上了 洛夫先生

translation.en: Figured we going after villains, you'll need 'em.
translation.zh: ‎我们要去抓坏人 这玩意会派上用场

translation.en: Obliged.
What y'all waiting around for?
You think destiny is comin' to you?
translation.zh: ‎你们觉得命运会来找你们吗？

translation.en: Hyup! Go!
-Yeah. I know. -[horse whinnies]
Go ahead.
♪ Wahala they go Wahala they come ♪
[Rufus] How do I look?
[Trudy] All right.
Everybody out there?
Just about.
How could you do it?
Leave all of this to Wiley?
If you were runnin' Redwood,
who woulda kept the operation goin'?
Who else woulda kept all them gangs in line?
translation.zh: ‎还有谁能管得住他们那帮人？

translation.en: Look, I know that Wiley got his ways, but he was loyal once.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我知道威利我行我素
‎但他以前很忠诚

translation.en: Loyalty is a virtue, Rufus.
Till it ain't.
You loyal to me?
See these folk here?
Either they can't see it or they don't want to.
translation.zh: ‎他们要么看不见 要么不想看见

translation.en: But I believe in what you're doing.
This place can be the promised land for us.
translation.zh: ‎这地方可以成为我们的乐土

translation.en: And as long as that so, ain't nothing I won't do to see it through.
translation.zh: ‎既然如此 我会竭尽全力促成这一点

translation.en: You tell them.
[Trudy] Citizens of Redwood.
A new day is dawning.
As by now you have doubtless learned,
the territory will officially open up for settlement.
translation.zh: ‎该领土正式开放 供白人定居

translation.en: Now they say everything we own is gonna stay our own.
translation.zh:
‎现在他们说我们拥有的一切
‎都会归我们自己所有

translation.en: But you know as well as I do how much that's worth.
translation.zh: ‎但你和我都知道 那话有多可信

translation.en: See, your land, your businesses, your homes
translation.zh:
‎听着 你们的土地
‎你们的生意 你们的家

translation.en: has all been promised to the highest bidders
translation.zh: ‎都被你们的前任警长威利·埃斯科

translation.en: by your one-time sheriff, Wiley Escoe.
Now, Mr. Buck can prevent this from happening.
translation.zh: ‎现在 巴克先生可以阻止这一切发生

translation.en: But in order for us to do that, it's necessary that we levy a tax.
translation.zh:
‎但为了能够做到这一点
‎我们需要征税

translation.en: -[crowd muttering] -At what cost to us?
You could scrape every penny from every living soul in this town,
translation.zh: ‎你榨干这个小镇上每个人的每分钱

translation.en: and it wouldn't come near to that.
You got us between a rock and a hard place.
How long you been alive in this country?
A rock and a hard place is what we call Monday.
I've heard of Rufus Buck.
How bad a man he is.
But he got himself thrown in jail once before,
and I reckon he'll be back there again soon enough.
When he is, maybe I'll come back to this town.
translation.zh: ‎当他入狱时 我或许会回到这个小镇

translation.en: 'Cause I ain't paying shit.
You think I made Redwood for myself?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我管理红木城是为了我自己？

translation.en: To what end?
Redwood ain't a hiding place, 'cause I don't hide.
It ain't a dream. I don't dream.
You know what it is?
It's an example.
It's an example…
for others to follow.
And you…
you are an enemy of progress.
Please. Please.
-I got a family. -What's your name?
James.
[Rufus] Rest in peace, James.
Now, how much?
How much can be gathered?
Ten thousand.
Maybe 15, if every last cent can be squeezed.
translation.zh: ‎或许一万五 如果能榨干每一分钱

translation.en: Ain't nobody leave town until we collect it all.
translation.zh: ‎等我们收集完钱 大家才能离开

translation.en: And if you fail to comply,
you and everything you love will burn.
translation.zh: ‎你和你所爱的一切都会被摧毁

translation.en: I ain't got nothin' to rob.
But I got somebody to shoot. Step down.
Wiley Escoe. Bass Reeves.
Fuck.
Redwood crawling with gunmen.
Rufus came with 12 and took six of mine.
translation.zh:
‎鲁弗斯带了12个枪手来
‎还带走了6个我的人

translation.en: Who knows how many he got by now.
I don't believe a thing this man sayin'.
He a scout. I say we kill him.
translation.zh: ‎他是个探子 要我说 我们杀了他

translation.en: And we take the rest of them teeth.
You ever shot a sheriff, boy? A mayor?
translation.zh: ‎你杀过警长吗 孩子？镇长呢？

translation.en: Little harder than shootin' regular folk. And I'm both.
translation.zh:
‎比射杀普通人稍微难一点
‎而我两者都是

translation.en: [Bass] You both alive and dead 'cause Rufus don't like loose ends.
translation.zh: ‎你是暂且苟活 因为鲁弗斯还没做完

translation.en: Law don't find a man like Rufus Buck unless you got inside information.
translation.zh:
‎法律制裁不了鲁弗斯·巴克这样的人
‎除非你有内部消息

translation.en: Ain't that right, Wiley?
If I had my way, you'd be right up under the jail next to Rufus.
translation.zh:
‎如果按我说的做
‎你早就跟着鲁弗斯入狱了

translation.en: But you cut yourself a deal, wound up wearing a badge instead.
translation.zh: ‎但你做了交易 结果戴上了警徽

translation.en: You got your reasons you want Rufus gone, and I got mine.
translation.zh:
‎你有你想杀鲁弗斯的原因
‎我有我的原因

translation.en: Ain't the enemy of my enemy my friend?
Rufus tryin' to save Redwood. But for that, he need money.
translation.zh:
‎鲁弗斯在试着拯救红木城
‎但为此他需要钱

translation.en: And that's one thing he ain't have.
All right, look here. You made a deal with the Devil.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 听着 你和恶魔做了交易

translation.en: Now he come to collect.
You rest up, but be gone before sunup.
translation.zh:
‎你休息一下
‎但要在太阳升起之前离开

translation.en: Or it's gonna go from bad to badder. You hear?
translation.zh: ‎否则情况只会更糟 你听见了吗？

translation.en: Marshal. Marshal. Marshal.
All them tricks'll get you killed, son.
translation.zh: ‎那些把戏会害死你的 孩子

translation.en: [Jim] Listen, Marshal.
I'm faster than any weapon. You can trust in that.
translation.zh:
‎我比任何武器都更快
‎你可以相信这一点

translation.en: I seen faster.
All right. Where?
In the mirror.
Negro said, "In the mirror."
[Jim] I'm so… I'm sorry.
I rather ride into a gun battle on a dark horse over a golden stallion.
translation.zh:
‎我宁肯骑着黑马枪战
‎也不要骑金色种马

translation.en: -Fuck that mean? -Shiny shit get shot.
translation.zh:
‎-那什么意思？
‎-金灿灿的东西容易被打中

translation.en: You gonna shoot me?
What you think about that, lawman?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得那怎么样 执法者？

translation.en: I think y'all gonna die.
[Nat singing] ♪ And away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
♪ As her garden grows ♪
♪ Hold those flowers close ♪
♪ For away with the wind ♪
♪ She goes ♪
I'll be back with information by sunup.
translation.zh: ‎天亮前 我会带着消息回来的

translation.en: Information from where?
Redwood.
You know we can't trust Wiley's word.
translation.zh: ‎你知道我们不能相信威利的话

translation.en: Someone's got to get the lay of the land before we make our next move.
translation.zh:
‎在我们采取下一步行动前
‎总得有人了解一下情况

translation.en: Yeah, Mary, but that somebody ain't got to be you.
translation.zh: ‎玛丽 那个人不一定得是你

translation.en: Every gunhand in the territory's gonna recognize you the second you hop off your horse.
translation.zh: ‎你一跳下马背 每个人都会认出你的

translation.en: Same with Bill and Beckwourth.
In case you forgot,
your face more famous than all of ours put together, Stagecoach Mary.
translation.zh:
‎“驿站邮递员”玛丽
‎你比我们所有人加起来都出名

translation.en: Got it up on advertisements for that saloon of yours from here to Texas.
translation.zh:
‎从这儿到德州一带
‎你的酒馆的广告 到处都是

translation.en: Which is why I can ride into town in plain sight.
translation.zh: ‎所以我可以在众目睽睽之下骑马进城

translation.en: Everybody knows I'm buying saloons.
translation.zh:
‎大家都知道我在收购酒馆
‎鲁弗斯需要钱

translation.en: Rufus need money. I'ma make him an offer on Trudy Smith's place--
translation.zh:
‎大家都知道我在收购酒馆
‎鲁弗斯需要钱 ‎我会就楚蒂·史密斯那地儿
‎给他报价…

translation.en: Mary, what in my character makes you think I'll allow that?
translation.zh: ‎玛丽 你凭什么觉得我会同意？

translation.en: I'm not asking for your permission.
All right.
Then I… I guess I'll just be asking you for yours.
Since you'll never let a man give you away,
translation.zh:
‎既然你永远都不会
‎让人牵着你走进结婚殿堂

translation.en: I just have to ask you direct.
That's the ring my father gave my mother.
translation.zh: ‎那是我爸爸给我妈妈的戒指

translation.en: I was gonna give it to you back in Douglas.
translation.zh: ‎我本来想在道格拉斯镇的时候给你

translation.en: But you didn't.
I am now.
I used to hate feeling helpless over you.
translation.zh: ‎我以前讨厌在你面前无助的感觉

translation.en: Those days are over now.
Mary…
When the dust settles, we gonna go our separate ways, for good.
translation.zh: ‎等尘埃落定 我们就永远分道扬镳

translation.en: But not till the dust settles. I'm here till then.
translation.zh: ‎但尘埃还未落定 我仍然在这里

translation.en: See you sunup.
Are you a resident of Redwood, ma'am?
translation.zh: ‎你是红木城的居民吗 女士？

translation.en: You don't own a gun confident enough to ask where I reside.
translation.zh:
‎你的枪吓不倒我
‎所以你不能问我住哪儿

translation.en: Well, this gun say answer the damn question.
Well, this gun don't talk.
[Trudy] Stagecoach Mary.
Ghastly Gertrude Smith.
I prefer Treacherous Trudy myself, but I'll take it.
translation.zh:
‎我更希望人们叫我“奸诈的楚蒂”
‎但我欣然接受

translation.en: What brings you to my town?
translation.zh: ‎什么风把你吹来我的城镇了？

translation.en: I heard Rufus Buck was back.
-News travels fast. -[man chuckles]
I have an offer he might wanna hear about.
translation.zh: ‎我有个提议 他可能会想听

translation.en: Well, any offer you got,
you can make it to me.
I don't do business with the help.
Give me that shit.
Lead the way, Treacherous Trudy.
Speak your piece.
I assume you know who I am.
I assume you know who I used to run with.
Those days are over for me anyhow,
translation.zh:
‎不管怎样 那些日子
‎对我来说已经过去了

translation.en: but I didn't get to be Stagecoach Mary Fields
translation.zh: ‎但若没有我的耳目打探消息

translation.en: without having my ears to the ground
translation.zh:
‎我也成不了
‎“驿站邮递员”玛丽·菲尔德

translation.en: and my ears tell me you just lost 25 thou that was coming your way.
translation.zh:
‎我的耳目跟我说
‎你回来的路上丢了两万五

translation.en: [Trudy] I hope your proposal rivals your nerve--
Allow me the latitude of completion.
My saloon in Douglas is boomin'.
translation.zh: ‎我在道格拉斯的酒馆的生意非常好

translation.en: Bought me another one in the Elks, and I got a restaurant in Cascade too.
translation.zh:
‎我在麋鹿区又买了一家
‎我也在喀斯喀特开了一家餐厅

translation.en: For the sum of all that, I could take this one off your hands.
translation.zh: ‎总的来说 我可以从你手里买一家

translation.en: The mere mention of my name brings forth good business
to any establishment attached, whereas,
translation.zh: ‎任何附属企业都会生意兴隆的

translation.en: with all due respect, but the name Rufus Buck instils fear.
translation.zh:
‎恕我直言 鲁弗斯·巴克的名字
‎只会让人害怕

translation.en: We know who you are.
You walkin' into my town with that proposal is risky.
translation.zh:
‎你带着这个提议
‎来我的地盘是很危险的

translation.en: The kind of risk a woman such as yourself wouldn't tie herself to
translation.zh:
‎除非有更大的风险
‎否则你这样的女人

translation.en: unless there was a whole lot more at stake.
See, I don't believe in coincidence,
like you just gonna walk in here
translation.zh: ‎深红面罩帮糟人伏击 我的钱被抢走

translation.en: right after the Crimson Hoods get ambushed with my money.
translation.zh: ‎深红面罩帮糟人伏击 我的钱被抢走 ‎事情才刚发生 你就出现在这里

translation.en: What are you thinking?
You must have forgot whose name is on the door.
translation.zh: ‎你一定忘了门上写的是谁的名字

translation.en: Another round.
We havin' a party, y'all. Come on.
[Nat] All right, Mary.
All right.
So you still sayin' you don't know nothin' about that money
translation.zh:
‎所以你仍然表示
‎自己对那笔钱一无所知

translation.en: and you done come here alone?
That's right.
You done rode all the way over here to get yourself killed.
And for what?
For love?
Love is the only thing worth dying for.
translation.zh: ‎爱是唯一值得为之奉献生命的事

translation.en: But you wouldn't know anything about that.
You know, I had a sister named Mary.
She was pretty, strong-willed, like you.
translation.zh: ‎她很漂亮 意志坚定 像你一样

translation.en: She died of polio when I was 11.
translation.zh: ‎我11岁的时候 她死于小儿麻痹症

translation.en: Always was in pain, but she'd never let me see her cry.
translation.zh:
‎她一直生活在痛苦中
‎但她从不在我面前哭

translation.en: There's this girl called Hope lived by us.
translation.zh: ‎有个叫奥普的姑娘 住我们隔壁

translation.en: Big fat kid, always picking on the smaller kids.
translation.zh: ‎又大又胖 总是霸凌个子小的孩子

translation.en: Obviously out of jealousy.
But she ain't never fuck with me though.
She hated Mary with a passion,
always teasing her about how thin and frail she was.
Then one day, Hope walkin' by our house,
translation.zh: ‎然后一天 奥普走过我们家

translation.en: apple in one hand, blade in the other.
translation.zh: ‎一只手拿着苹果 另一只手拿着刀

translation.en: She decided to throw the apple across the street at Mary,
translation.zh: ‎她决定朝街对面的玛丽扔苹果

translation.en: and it hit my sister in the head and knocked her out of balance.
translation.zh:
‎苹果砸在我妹妹的头上
‎让她失去了平衡

translation.en: She fell down the steps.
Broke her ankle.
And now that…
that was the first and only time I physically seen my sister cry.
translation.zh:
‎那是我第一次也是唯一一次
‎亲眼看到我妹妹哭

translation.en: And there was Hope standing there laughin' her ugly fuckin' face off.
translation.zh:
‎奥普就站在那
‎那张丑陋的脸大笑不止

translation.en: My daddy…
he got home,
he took off his belt, and he beat me for not protecting my sister.
translation.zh:
‎他抽出皮带打我
‎因为我没有保护妹妹

translation.en: He lashed me until my whole body went numb.
translation.zh: ‎他抽打我 直到我身体麻木才停

translation.en: Then
he went to Hope house to do the same thing to her.
translation.zh: ‎他去奥普家 想要对她做同样的事

translation.en: When he got there, he saw her whole family standin' on the side of the house,
translation.zh:
‎当他到那里时 他看见她全家
‎站在屋子那边

translation.en: all of 'em screamin' and cryin',
and there was Hope…
lyin' on the floor in a pool of blood.
translation.zh: ‎躺在地板上 倒在血泊中

translation.en: Somebody had slit her throat. Killed her with her own knife.
translation.zh:
‎有人割破了她的喉咙
‎用她自己的刀杀了她

translation.en: Daddy was speechless.
He ain't said a word to me when he came home.
translation.zh: ‎他回家后 一个字都没跟我说

translation.en: The next day, he sent me to live with my grandparents.
translation.zh: ‎第二天 他送我去跟爷爷奶奶住

translation.en: And then the next time I seen my sister,
she was laying in a coffin.
Disease had killed her.
I'm sorry your sister had to suffer.
translation.zh: ‎很遗憾你妹妹受了那么多苦

translation.en: I admire her bravery.
But you get no words from me.
translation.zh: ‎但你从我这里什么都打听不出来

translation.en: You know, I actually admire your bravery.
But I'm afraid the outcome is still the outcome.
translation.zh: ‎但恐怕该发生的仍然会发生

translation.en: Hope must die.
But not yet.
Leave her out here in the street so everybody can see her.
translation.zh: ‎把她丢在街上 让所有人都能看见她

translation.en: No one come to collect her 'fore sunup, put a bullet in her head.
translation.zh:
‎如果天亮前没人来救她
‎朝她脑袋开一枪

translation.en: [man] Yes, ma'am.
Looks like we don't have to wait that long.
Whoever die first, right?
-Whoever die first. -[Jim] Mmm-hmm.
Get her up.
"Whoever die first"?
Now, what kind of dumbass saying is that?
You two trying to get shot out here?
translation.zh: ‎你们俩想在这里挨枪子儿吗？

translation.en: Nat Love. How predictable.
You predict my friend Bill Pickett aiming at your bowler cap?
translation.zh:
‎你料到我的朋友比尔·皮克特
‎会瞄准你的圆礼帽吗？

translation.en: You'll be dead before your boys get their aim.
translation.zh: ‎在你的人拿出武器前 你就没命了

translation.en: And you die right after.
But your boss won't see one red cent of that money.
translation.zh: ‎但你的老板一分钱都拿不到

translation.en: My boss?
Where is he?
Where is who?
[Nat] Marshal.
I'm speakin' English, yeah?
-Sound like English to me. -[Nat] Mmm-hmm.
Where's Rufus Buck?
Bass.
[Bass] Trudy.
If I'd known you were switchin' sides, I'da asked you to come join us.
translation.zh:
‎如果我知道你倒戈了
‎我会让你加入我们的

translation.en: You here for your damsel in distress?
You don't look hard of hearing.
So I'ma ask you again.
Where's Rufus Buck?
Well, clearly, you don't know me.
Tell your men to go, but you stay,
translation.zh: ‎让你的人离开 但你留下

translation.en: and maybe your damsel will live a little longer.
translation.zh: ‎或许你的美人儿会活得久一点

translation.en: Marshal.
You're pretty though.
-Ah, take her ass back in there. -Yes, ma'am.
Gonna get me a drink.
[Jim] Hey.
That the quick draw I hear tell about, Cherokee Bill?
translation.zh:
‎我听说你很擅长快速拔枪
‎切诺基·比尔？

translation.en: I hear you so fast that your opponents ain't got time to draw
translation.zh:
‎我听说你动作很快
‎你的对手都没机会拔枪

translation.en: before you put two in they back.
translation.zh: ‎你就已经朝他们的后背开了两枪

translation.en: No, that ain't me.
I'm the Cherokee Bill that shoots men in the mouth that talk too much.
translation.zh: ‎我是切诺基·比尔 专杀话太多的人

translation.en: I'll make it easy for you, then.
You draw first.
That what you think this is? "Who the quickest draw in the West?"
translation.zh:
‎你觉得就是这样？
‎“谁是西部最快的拔枪手”？

translation.en: All comes down to who fast and who ain't, right?
translation.zh: ‎一切都取决于谁快谁慢 好吗？

translation.en: No, it all comes down to who's alive and who's dead.
translation.zh: ‎不 一切都取决于谁生谁死

translation.en: Trudy, I'm gonna get me something to drink.
Good night.
Hey, hey, drink, my ass, man.
-I practiced that standoff all night. -Jim.
translation.zh:
‎-我整晚都在为这个僵局练习
‎-吉姆

translation.en: -[Jim] You're not about to walk away. -[Nat] Get out of here.
translation.zh: ‎你不能就这样离开…别不尊重…

translation.en: -No, nobody-- -[Nat] Get out of here, Jim.
translation.zh:
‎-不 等等
‎-离开这里 吉姆

translation.en: -[Jim] That chicken-- -[Bass] It ain't the time.
Okay. Okay.
[man] March, boy.
-I said march! -March.
Hup, two, three, four.
That's enough.
They beat you bad?
I'ma kill 'em all.
[Rufus] You familiar with Napoleon?
He said, "I am driven towards an end that I do not know."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“我被驱赶到一个
‎我不知道的终点

translation.en: "As I reach it, as I shall become unnecessary,
translation.zh: ‎当我到达那里 我会成为多余的人

translation.en: an atom shall suffice to shatter me."
"Until then, all forces of humankind can do nothing to stop me."
translation.zh:
‎直到那时 所有人类的力量
‎都奈何不了我”

translation.en: That's a man who knew exactly who he was.
Most importantly, he knew that his time would come to an end.
translation.zh:
‎最重要的是
‎他知道他的王朝终将陨落

translation.en: Cut him down.
You know why…
I gave you that scar?
[Nat] So I'd remember you.
[Rufus] No.
No, I gave you that scar so I can know your face when you come back to me.
translation.zh:
‎不 我给你那条伤疤
‎你回来找我的时候 我就能认出你

translation.en: Nat Love,
the outlaw who robs outlaws,
the angel of death who hunts down those who trespass against him with no mercy.
translation.zh:
‎死亡的使者 毫不留情地
‎猎杀冒犯过他的人

translation.en: I know who you are.
And I see the line that you won't cross.
See, I know what's on the other side.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我知道另一边是什么

translation.en: Apologize for the beating.
It was more of an indication for what Ms. Fields might see
translation.zh:
‎这主要是要让菲尔德小姐
‎了解如果我们达不成协议

translation.en: if we fail to come to terms.
[Nat] What terms?
You will return the money you stole from me by Friday noon.
translation.zh:
‎周五中午前
‎把你从我这里偷走的钱还给我

translation.en: Not a moment later.
And you will add $10,000 on top of that. We'll call that interest.
translation.zh: ‎你还要再加一万 我们称之为利息

translation.en: Somethin' funny?
Ooh, shit, how… how you reckon I'ma get that?
translation.zh:
‎该死 怎么…
‎你觉得我该怎么才弄到钱？

translation.en: You're gonna rob a bank.
Nat Love is gonna rob a bank.
In the meantime, here's a little token of my appreciation in advance.
translation.zh: ‎与此同时 这是我的一点小心意

translation.en: Go ahead, open it.
I expect my money on Friday.
All of it.
[Bass] You know I can't let you do that.
translation.zh: ‎你知道我不会让你这么做的

translation.en: If that money ain't in Rufus' hands in three days, Mary'll die.
translation.zh:
‎如果三天后
‎鲁弗斯拿不到钱 玛丽就会死

translation.en: [Pickett] What bank we talking about anyway? [Nat] Maysville.
translation.zh:
‎-我们说的是什么银行？
‎-梅斯维尔

translation.en: Maysville?
That's a white town.
Yeah, which is why they gonna have $10,000 in their bank.
translation.zh: ‎对 所以他们的银行里才有一万

translation.en: It's crazy.
[Jim] My emotions are all types of confused.
I mean, Pickett, I agree. That's crazy.
translation.zh: ‎皮克特 我同意 太疯狂了

translation.en: But, Nat, I also agree with you telling the marshal
translation.zh: ‎但纳特 我也认同你跟这位执法官说

translation.en: that we gonna do that shit anyways.
translation.zh: ‎无论如何 我们都要做这事

translation.en: That's some true outlaw shit.
-We outlaws, ain't we? -[Nat] Ain't no "we," Jim.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要违法…
‎-不是我们 吉姆

translation.en: Not after that shit you pulled in town nearly got us all killed.
translation.zh: ‎你在镇上搞的那些事差点害死我们

translation.en: I had that.
[Nat] Fetch that money you took from the Crimson Hoods.
translation.zh: ‎去取回你从深红面罩帮抢的钱

translation.en: Pickett, kid, you comin' with me.
translation.zh: ‎皮克特 孩子 你们跟我来

translation.en: If Rufus Buck want that bank took, why don't he send his own men?
translation.zh:
‎如果鲁弗斯·巴克想抢那家银行
‎他为何不派自己的人去做？

translation.en: This way he clean, see?
translation.zh: ‎这样他就不会牵涉其中 懂吗？

translation.en: I gotta go in barefaced as day,
a freshly minted bank robber, face up on wanted posters all over the territory.
translation.zh:
‎一个全新的银行抢劫犯
‎脸会出现在各个地区的通缉海报上

translation.en: They'll be on you like flies on shit before you open the door.
translation.zh:
‎你还没开门
‎他们就会像苍蝇一样黏上你

translation.en: Yep.
I said I had to be recognized.
Go ahead.
[Cuffee] Hell no.
For Mary.
Close shave.
Close fucking shave!
I thought I was falling for a fella for a little bit.
That's why I didn't say nothing.
Well, I ain't the only one. I can't…
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我不是唯一一个 我不能…

translation.en: I can't… It wasn't just me. It wasn't just me.
It was just you, Jim.
[Cuffee] Giddup now.
-[Nat] Allow me. -[grunts]
What's your real name?
Cuffee my real name.
Name I was born with? Cathay Williams.
translation.zh: ‎我出生时的名字？凯瑟·威廉姆斯

translation.en: You walk worse than you ride, Cathay.
translation.zh: ‎你走路比骑马差多了 凯瑟

translation.en: Mr. Love, my momma always told me to respect my elders,
translation.zh:
‎洛夫先生 我妈妈
‎总是告诉我要尊重长者

translation.en: so I'm not gonna say what I'm thinking.
translation.zh: ‎所以我不会告诉你我心里在想什么

translation.en: That's all right. I can read your mind.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我能读出你的想法

translation.en: Then I'm sorry you had to hear that.
Go ahead.
Go ahead, honey.
[teller] Yes?
I'd like to make a withdrawal.
What…
You have to have an account, ma'am.
And, well, I'd recommend a bank in Jericho or maybe Redwood for that.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我建议你去杰里科
‎或者也许去红木城的银行取钱

translation.en: I'm not talking about that kinda withdrawal.
I'm talk--
I'm talking about…
talking about that kind.
Hey, blue eyes.
You scared.
Your hand is shaking. You'll miss.
translation.zh: ‎你的手在抖 你会射偏的

translation.en: I won't.
Exhale.
Attaboy.
I ain't like my partner.
He don't wanna shoot nobody, but all of a sudden, I'm of a mind to.
translation.zh:
‎他不想开枪打任何人
‎但突然之间 我来了兴致

translation.en: Now open the fuckin' gate.
Think I'm funny now?
What you lookin' at?
Get all the customers over there.
-Get 'em over there! -Okay, okay.
-Everyone, please, this way quickly. -You too. Move!
translation.zh:
‎-各位 拜托 这边快点
‎-你也是 快去！

translation.en: Times have changed, ain't they?
They say robbing banks is hard work.
That's a lie. Robbing banks is easy.
translation.zh: ‎那是谎言 打劫银行很简单

translation.en: The hard part is doing it without killing.
So, what'll it be…
Mr. Manager?
Good man.
[Cuffee] Come on. Let's go.
Come on. Giddyap. Go.
-Pleasure banking with you. -Okay, sir.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴抢你的银行
‎-好的 先生

translation.en: Nat Love.
Don't even look like much.
Ain't what it look like. It's what it can buy you.
translation.zh:
‎看起来如何并不重要
‎重要的是它可以给你买什么

translation.en: Rufus won't let Mary go once he gets that money.
translation.zh: ‎鲁弗斯拿到钱也不会让玛丽走

translation.en: Yeah, I know it.
He'll kill her, let me go, so's I carry that hurt with me.
translation.zh:
‎他会杀了她 让我走
‎这样我就心存伤痛

translation.en: So what, we just went through all that trouble for nothin'?
translation.zh: ‎所以我们费了这么大劲却一无所获？

translation.en: Now we got something he want.
And that's it?
Gonna have to be.
You can be all hasty and shoot me now if you want,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们想的话 现在就可以杀了我

translation.en: or you can wait to see what I brought with me first.
translation.zh: ‎或者你们可以先看看我带来了什么

translation.en: [Wiley] Rufus got stashes like this all across these hills.
translation.zh: ‎鲁弗斯把这些东西藏在山上各处

translation.en: Enough for a small army.
Don't nobody take what I got coming to me.
translation.zh: ‎谁也别拿我的武器来对付我

translation.en: Not even the Devil himself.
[Bass] Rufus Buck is a man.
Y'all best reconcile yourselves with that fact.
Man or devil, this gonna be Buck's last day amongst the living.
translation.zh:
‎无论是人还是恶魔
‎巴克都活不过今天

translation.en: ♪ Upon my return ♪ ♪ See a changed soul ♪
translation.zh: ‎我回来的时候 会改头换面

translation.en: -♪ That road was far ♪ -♪ That road was far ♪
-♪ And way too long ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ And way too long ♪
-♪ They'll run from me ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ They'll run from me ♪
translation.zh:
‎-他们逃离我身边
‎-他们逃离我身边

translation.en: -♪ As they ran from you ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ As they ran from you ♪
translation.zh:
‎-正如他们逃离你身边
‎-正如他们逃离你身边

translation.en: -♪ That fear in me ♪ -[Nat and Jim] ♪ That fear in me ♪
translation.zh:
‎-我内心的恐惧
‎-我内心的恐惧

translation.en: ♪ Is in a distant view ♪
♪ Is ♪
♪ In a distant ♪
♪ View ♪
Afternoon.
I would ask you to run go fetch your superior,
but that'd be like asking you to run go fetch your daddy.
translation.zh: ‎但那像是让你跑去找你爸爸一样

translation.en: It could be anybody, right?
You know,
I'm willing to bet my right arm
I've got a higher body count than yours.
That'd be a bad bet, son.
translation.zh: ‎这赌局可不怎么好 孩子

translation.en: I fancy that song or whatever it was you was whistling there.
translation.zh:
‎我很喜欢那首歌 或者说
‎是你在那里吹的口哨

translation.en: [Bass] Go, Jerry. Go.
That our money?
Walk with me.
Hey, just… just walk with me.
-Keep an eye on this, Angel. -[Angel] Mmm-hmm.
You know they call your boss the Devil hisself?
translation.zh:
‎你知道
‎他们称你老板为“恶魔本尊”吗？

translation.en: Even the Devil needed money, right?
So being as how we are in possession of that money…
translation.zh: ‎所以 既然我们现在拿着钱

translation.en: let me dictate the terms of engagement.
What the fuck was that? What the fuck was that, old man?
Is that the right arm or the left?
Oh man.
Well, now there's us…
and there's y'all.
You get a hold of your feisty buddy here.
translation.zh: ‎你得控制住你的暴脾气 孩子

translation.en: You got a little rowdy rascal.
-Mary. -[Cherokee Bill] Yeah, we'll get to that.
translation.zh:
‎-玛丽
‎-嗯 稍后再说她的事

translation.en: -We gonna count this first. -Now, Cherokee.
translation.zh:
‎-我们得先把数目点清楚
‎-马上带过来 切诺基

translation.en: Or your boss gonna be one quick draw and $35,000 short.
translation.zh:
‎否则你老板不仅会失去一个快枪手
‎还会丢掉三万五

translation.en: All right.
Unhitch this horse so's Mary can ride out.
translation.zh: ‎把这匹马解开 玛丽就可以骑马走

translation.en: -You always move so slow? -[Cherokee Bill] You always talk so much?
translation.zh:
‎-你动作总是那么慢吗？
‎-你话总是那么多吗？

translation.en: [Nat] Really?
In the back?
What you think, Beckwourth?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得怎么样 贝克沃斯？

translation.en: Nah, he wouldn't do that
'cause then I would have to put a bullet in his cranium.
translation.zh:
‎因为那样的话
‎我得朝他头盖骨开一枪

translation.en: And we'll never know who the fastest really is now, will we?
translation.zh: ‎我们永远都不知道谁更快了 对吧？

translation.en: [Cherokee Bill] I gotta hand it to you, boy.
You do know how to make a grand entrance.
Shit, I didn't even rehearse that one.
translation.zh: ‎该死 我甚至都没排练这部分

translation.en: You know, quick draw, Nat Love is a dead man walking.
translation.zh: ‎快枪手 纳特·洛夫是将死之人

translation.en: But you don't have to be.
Why don't you get on your horse, get your shit,
translation.zh: ‎你为何不骑上马 拿上你的东西

translation.en: and go back to whatever it is you call home?
You know that's impossible.
Count down from five?
Five…
Four…
Three…
Why do they always have to count so slow?
Jim!
Blow that bitch, Bill!
Kill her.
Mary!
Push!
Trudy's mine.
Let's go.
[Cherokee Bill] Son of a bitch!
Exhale, motherfucker.
[Bass] Come on.
-Where'd they get you? -Shoulder. Get down!
translation.zh:
‎-他们打到你哪儿了？
‎-肩膀 趴下！

translation.en: Matches.
You wanna smoke now?
Matches, Bass.
Okay.
Jump, motherfuckers.
Fuck it.
I always knew it was you
who gave me up.
God knew my heart.
Goodbye, old friend.
Rufus, I didn't have a choice--
I told that kid. Them damn tricks…
translation.zh: ‎我跟那孩子说过 这把戏会害死他的

translation.en: -Sorry, ladies. -[footsteps rapidly approaching]
-You all right, Cuffee? -Just need to reload.
translation.zh:
‎-你还好吗 科菲？
‎-只需要装弹

translation.en: You look hurt, Mr. Pickett.
translation.zh: ‎你看起来受伤了 皮克特先生

translation.en: Ain't nothing but a flesh wound. Maggie ain't ready for me today.
translation.zh:
‎只不过是皮肉伤而已
‎我今儿还死不了

translation.en: What the fuck?
I'll be damned.
[Cuffee] Pickett!
[Cherokee Bill] Now, why you got that look on your face?
translation.zh: ‎你现在脸上为什么是这表情？

translation.en: No. No, no, no, brother, no, no, no.
Stop that. Don't do that.
You had a choice.
You always got a choice.
[speaking Cherokee] Being scared will only give you bad karma in the afterlife.
translation.zh: ‎害怕只会给你的来世积累恶果

translation.en: He didn't even have a chance, you son of a bitch!
translation.zh: ‎他甚至没有机会反击 混蛋！

translation.en: You gonna shoot me in the back too? Or cheat the count?
translation.zh:
‎你也要在背后开枪打我？
‎还是倒数时作弊呢？

translation.en: Beckwourth was faster.
Look after my friend.
[Bass] Nat.
Don't miss.
Pick up your guns.
[Rufus] I know what it is now.
It's the eyes.
Pick 'em up, I said.
[Rufus] Your father,
he was a good man?
He was.
And my mother was a good woman before you cut 'em down.
translation.zh:
‎在你杀掉他们之前
‎我妈妈也是个好女人

translation.en: Seems we had a different upbringing.
I don't care how you was raised.
Now pick up your guns and turn around.
I used to watch my father beat my mother to a pulp
translation.zh: ‎我过去看着爸爸狠狠地打妈妈

translation.en: if she overcooked his food.
translation.zh: ‎只因她把他的食物煮过了头

translation.en: He cut her up real good if she undercooked it too.
translation.zh: ‎如果没煮熟的话 他也会狠狠伤害她

translation.en: One day, I decided to intervene,
and he turned his wrath on me.
My father was not a good man.
Not a good man. He was an outlaw.
translation.zh: ‎不是个好人 他是个不法之徒

translation.en: Robbin' banks…
He liked to drink.
My mother took a bottle and cut him to protect me.
translation.zh: ‎我妈妈拿起酒瓶 割伤他来保护我

translation.en: He lashed back at her, and just like that, she was gone.
translation.zh: ‎他回击 就这样 她死了

translation.en: Then, like the coward he is,
translation.zh: ‎然后 他就像个胆小鬼一样

translation.en: he took everything we had and left,
translation.zh: ‎他拿走全部家当 一走了之

translation.en: leaving me with my…
my mother.
I was ten years old, you know…
about the same age you was…
translation.zh: ‎我给你留下那道伤疤的时候

translation.en: when I gave you that scar.
I had to fend for myself, but I became who I am,
translation.zh:
‎我得自己照顾自己
‎但我成就了现在的自己

translation.en: just like you.
As I did, all I could ever think about is wanting my father to pay for what he did.
translation.zh:
‎当我这么做的时候 我满脑子想的
‎都是要父亲为他的所作所为付出代价

translation.en: I searched for him for years and years, and I could never find him.
translation.zh: ‎我年复一年地找他 我永远都找不到

translation.en: It's like he disappeared off the face of the earth.
I ain't stop though. I kept looking…
translation.zh: ‎但我没有停止 我继续找

translation.en: until I did find him.
One day…
lo and behold,
there he was, my father,
a new man.
He was clean now.
Sober.
Man of God.
Had a church.
He had a pretty little wife.
And he had a son,
about the age of ten years old,
whose eyes blazed like mine.
You're lyin'.
You're lyin'!
Killing our father was retribution, but--
translation.zh: ‎杀了我们的父亲是报仇 但是…

translation.en: My father!
My mother!
But it weren't enough.
Letting you live,
that was the true revenge.
Every sin you made, every bank you robbed, everybody you killed.
translation.zh:
‎你犯下的每个罪行 抢的每家银行
‎杀的每一个人

translation.en: I mean, look at you.
You everything he tried to run away from.
translation.zh: ‎你所做的一切都是他努力逃避的

translation.en: Buck.
Changed his name to "Love."
You a Buck.
You lyin'.
Just like me.
Just like him.
But you better. You gonna surpass even me because…
translation.zh: ‎但你更好 你甚至会超过我 因为

translation.en: I couldn't kill my brother.
Yet here you are about to kill yours.
[sighs] It's time to take your revenge, Nathaniel Buck.
translation.zh: ‎是时候报仇了 纳撒尼尔·巴克

translation.en: Go on.
-Nathaniel Buck. -No.
Take your revenge.
Nathaniel Buck.
-[gunshot] -Take your goddamn revenge!
You a Buck.
Nathaniel Buck.
-Nathaniel-- -[gunshot]
[Mary, softly] Is the Devil dead?
I don't know.
♪ They’ll run from me ♪
♪ As they ran from you ♪ ♪ The fear in me ♪
♪ Is in a distant view ♪ ♪ And there ain’t no turning around ♪
All right, fellas.
You sure the law gonna believe he's dead?
translation.zh: ‎你确定法律会相信他死了吗？

translation.en: I'm the law, Ms. Mary.
If I say a man dead, he dead.
translation.zh: ‎如果我说一个人死了 那他就是死了

translation.en: And you?
You sure this what you want?
I always kinda wanted to be a deputy, sheriff, marshal person.
translation.zh: ‎我一直想当副警长、警长、执法官

translation.en: What you lookin' at?
We got work to do, Mr. Love.
translation.zh: ‎我们有事要做 洛夫先生

translation.en: Let's go.
All right.
♪ And upon my return ♪ ♪ You’ll see a changed soul ♪ ♪ The road was far too long ♪
translation.zh:
‎以此纪念我亲爱的兄弟
‎理查德安特威和迈克尔威廉姆斯
